Class.name: sc.all.sub
Class.Description: Export different types of modules in different subfolders

Method.name: filename
Method.Implementation:
s ext = $p( code, ".", * ), ext = $zcvt( ext, "l" ) #; for each type - different directory s wd = ..workdir() s:ext'="" wd = ##class(%File).NormalizeDirectory( ext, wd ) d:'##class(%File).DirectoryExists( wd ) ##class(%File).CreateDirectoryChain( wd )
s filename = ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename( code, wd ) #; for *.dfi filename can contain folders if ext = "dfi" { s path = ##class(%File).GetDirectory( filename ) d:'##class(%File).DirectoryExists( path ) ##class(%File).CreateDirectoryChain( path ) } Q filename

Method.name: importUpdated
Method.Description: import from workdir all files with ts newer than code ts in db

Method.name: codename
Method.Implementation: s ext = $p( filename, ".", * ), ext = $zcvt( ext, "l" ) s path = ##class(%File).NormalizeDirectory( ext, ..workdir() ) s codename = $p( filename, path, 2 ) if ext = "dfi" { s fullname = $tr( codename, "\", "/" ) ; return fullname for dfi in $$$IsWINDOWS Q $p( fullname, ".", 1, *-1 ) ;remove extension } Q codename
